-Daily Herald. She loved that. -The Daily Herald. Great job.
translation.zh: -《每日先驱报》 她非常喜欢-《每日先驱报》 好工作

translation.en: I cannot believe that you talked to her before you talked to me.
translation.zh: 不敢相信你没跟我说就找她了

translation.en: Well, I wanted her input.
What about my input?
It's my life!
You can't just send me four states away and expect my perfect sister to fix me.
translation.zh: 你不能就这么送我到四个州之外指望我那完美的姐姐帮我

translation.en: We never said she would fix--
I'm tired of student council and all the clubs that I run,
translation.zh: 我厌倦了学生会和所有俱乐部的事

translation.en: and everything that I have to do and be responsible for every day.
translation.zh: 还有我每天要负责的那些事

translation.en: -But you're so good at it, Dakota. -Hon...
translation.zh: -可你非常擅长啊 达科塔-亲爱…

translation.en: this spot at Bertrand is not gonna stay open forever.
translation.zh: 伯特兰的这个位置不会一直有

translation.en: We need to think seriously about this.
And I'm sure they have, um, some kind of art--
Of course they do. Of course they do. We should get on this right away.
translation.zh: 当然了 我们该马上操作这事

translation.en: [Michael Caine] It can't fail. It's absolutely foolproof.
translation.zh: 它很容易操作 不可能失败

translation.en: [John Abbott] If it works the way you think it will work.
translation.zh: 若它如你所想的那样运作的话

translation.en: [Michael Caine] It works.
They'll write us up in books. We'll be historical.
translation.zh: 我们会被写进书里 成为历史人物

translation.en: [Mrs. Hodges] Jason, are you doing your homework?
translation.zh: 杰森 你在做作业吗？

translation.en: Yeah, don't worry about it.
I watched twelve heist movies.
translation.zh: 我看了12部偷盗题材的电影

translation.en: In three days?
That's not the point. The point is that we can do this.
translation.zh: 这不是重点 重点是我们能行

translation.en: What?
Do you know what that is?
I don't know, why?
It's an alarm that I was making for my room,
translation.zh: 是我正给自己房间做的警报器

translation.en: -but I was hoping if I handed it to you... -[alarm blaring]
translation.zh: 可我原本想着要是我把它交给你

translation.en: you'd start playing with it and I could probably use it to prove a point.
translation.zh: 你就会拿来玩而我就可以藉此来证明些事

translation.en: Give me that.
Good work, Benny.
Hodges, you are not in this class. Get out of here.
translation.zh: 霍奇斯 你不是这个班的 出去

translation.en: We need Benny.
Need me for what?
How were you able to do that so fast?
translation.zh: 你怎么这么快就让它不响了？

translation.en: I work in my uncle's garage on the weekends.
translation.zh: 我周末在我叔的修车行里打工

translation.en: Idiots set off their own car alarms all the time.
translation.zh: 总有傻逼触发自己车上的警报器

translation.en: Funny.
So you know how to work on machines?
translation.zh: 那你懂怎么操控机械喽？

translation.en: I'm a pretty decent mechanic, if that's what you're asking.
translation.zh: 我是个不错的机修工要是你是这个意思的话

translation.en: What would you say to a mechanic-related job?
translation.zh: 想干跟机械有关的活儿吗？

translation.en: One that can save the school?
Ten million dollar car repair?
I didn't say anything about cars.
Sounds illegal.
[teacher] I mean it. Out.
All of the heist movies that I watched had a team.
translation.zh: 我看的所有偷盗电影里都有个团队

translation.en: I don't think we can do this alone.
What about Dakota Cunningham? She's smart.
translation.zh: 达科塔坎宁安怎么样？她挺聪明的

translation.en: No, don't even think about it.
Don't even think about what?
Nothing.
Go away.
I know what's going on here.
-You do? -And I'm shutting it down.
Ms. Coyle said that we have to be off campus by 4:15.
translation.zh: 柯伊尔夫人说我们要在4点15前离校

translation.en: You can't create your own club when everyone else had to cancel theirs.
translation.zh: 你们不能在别人被迫关闭俱乐部时建立你们自己的俱乐部

translation.en: -It's just not fair. -[scoffs]
-Well, why don't you hear out what-- -Alice.
Ms. Coyle gave you a little bit of authority,
translation.zh: 柯伊尔夫人给了你一点权力

translation.en: and now you're running around school like you're in charge of everything.
translation.zh: 你就搞得好像自己说了算一样

translation.en: We're just sitting here, studying. Go.
translation.zh: 我们只是坐在这学习 走开

translation.en: Do you want to help us figure out how to steal ten million dollars?
translation.zh: 你想帮我们想办法 怎么偷到一千万吗？

translation.en: Excuse me, what?
[stammering] We're not stealing. We're... making.
Yeah.
We're going to break into... the Mint,
print a few coins and, um...
We're gonna rebuild the school's endowment.
Dakota, where are you going?
I'm talking to Ms. Coyle. I can't believe you'd do this.
translation.zh: 去找柯伊尔夫人真不敢相信你要这么做

translation.en: Listen, I'm sorry that I was such a shitty boyfriend.
translation.zh: 听着 抱歉我是个糟糕的男友

translation.en: I'm sorry that I got stoned and I forgot to take you to that audition.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我喝多了 没送你去试镜

translation.en: I'm sorry for that. I'm sorry for so many things right now, I don't even know where to begin.
translation.zh: 好多事都很抱歉 不知道该从哪说起

translation.en: I'm just trying to fix it.
Okay?
Hey, Dakota.
Will they be serving, uh, lunch at the lunch-themed dance?
translation.zh: 午餐主题舞会提供午餐吗？

translation.en: -I want in. -What?
[Jason] Of course you do.
This is not an opportunity to just boss us around.
Okay. I'll just leave and go tell Ms. Coyle about this whole conversation--
translation.zh: 好吧 那我去告诉柯伊尔夫人好了…

translation.en: Okay, stop talking.
You want to help? What can you do?
translation.zh: 你想帮忙吗？你能干什么？

translation.en: What's your thing?
Alibis, planning, covers.
translation.zh: 制造不在场证明 策划 掩护

translation.en: You know how serious I am about organization.
translation.zh: 你知道我对组织的事有多认真

translation.en: [Jason] Yeah, I do.
She used to color code our entire dating schedule.
translation.zh: 以前我们什么时候约会都是她说了算

translation.en: -Mmm. -It was horrible.
Thoughtful. It was very thoughtful.
I also act, so I have access to the theater wardrobe department,
translation.zh: 我还表演所以我还能弄到戏剧部的服装道具

translation.en: for anything that we need as far as covers go.
translation.zh: 弄到任何变装要用的东西

translation.en: -You act? -I just got cast in My Fair Lady.
translation.zh: -你会表演？-刚入选参演《窈窕淑女》

translation.en: Congrats.
Don't worry, it just got canceled.
translation.zh: 别担心 那个刚刚取消了

translation.en: I wonder why.
You know what? I think this is gonna work.
But there is one thing that you have to do first.
Do you know Benny from the football team?
translation.zh: 你认识橄榄球队的本尼吗？

translation.en: Benny, do you have a second?
Yeah.
I had a meeting with the bursar's office this morning,
translation.zh: 我今早跟主管奖学金的人开了个会

translation.en: and in light of everything that's happened,
it looks like the D.M. Jamison athletic scholarship... [sighs] is going to be discontinued.
translation.zh: 看来D.M.贾米森运动员奖学金不会继续发放了

translation.en: -But I was promised that money. -I know.
translation.zh: -但说好了要发给我的-我知道

translation.en: I kept my GPA up, I had a great season.
translation.zh: 我的绩点很高 这赛季打得也很好

translation.en: I know the team doesn't need me right now--
translation.zh: 我知道队伍目前不需要我…

translation.en: No, look, Benny, Benny, Benny, you're not the only one.
translation.zh: 不 听着 本尼 你不是唯一的一个

translation.en: When I know more, you'll know more.
translation.zh: 我一有新消息就告诉你

translation.en: More what? Reasons to kick out the poor kids?
translation.zh: 还有什么？把穷人家孩子踢出去的理由吗？

translation.en: It's not about that.
Hey.
I needed to talk to you.
Yeah, it's like the other day where it was weird and awkward, and I yelled at you.
translation.zh: 就像那天很奇怪尴尬 我还朝你乱吼

translation.en: -Did I ever apologize for that? -No.
I'm sorry.
Anyway, um... [chuckles]
I, uh, saw on your schedule that you have practice after school,
translation.zh: 我知道你会在课后进行训练

translation.en: so I was just hoping to catch you.
You know my schedule?
Well, I wanted to speak to you about Jason and Alice--
translation.zh: 我想跟你谈谈杰森和爱丽丝…

translation.en: Seriously... [sighs] no thanks.
translation.zh: 我说真的 不用了 谢谢

translation.en: Wait.
You know more about machines than anyone else in this school.
translation.zh: 你是学校里最懂机械的

translation.en: You know that you're the only person getting an A in robotics?
translation.zh: 你知道自己是机器人课唯一一个拿A的人吗？

translation.en: I might've looked at your grades, too. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我看过你的分数了 抱歉

translation.en: Listen, I didn't leave my old school to come get arrested here
for some dumb illegal plan the headmaster's kid came up with.
translation.zh: 可不是为了参与校长家孩子策划的愚蠢违法计划而被捕

translation.en: School means too much to me.
translation.zh: 学校对我来说太重要了

translation.en: I get it.
But you might not have a school to go to if we don't do something about it.
translation.zh: 可如果我们不做点什么就没学校可言了

translation.en: We need you.
Sorry to interrupt.
Jason...
visiting hours are almost over.
You can go without me.
Well, it'd be another week.
translation.zh: 下次探监就要等到下星期了

translation.en: I know.
I would, we just-- We have practice.
translation.zh: 我会去的 但我们要练习

translation.en: Okay.
I thought you said you didn't like Jason Hodges.
translation.zh: 我记得你说你不喜欢杰森霍奇斯

translation.en: He's fine. We're working on a project together.
translation.zh: 他挺好的 我们在一起做项目

translation.en: Okay. Whoa, hold on.
So, first you cancel on Friday night gaming,
translation.zh: 所以 你先是推掉了周五的游戏之夜

translation.en: and now you're dropping out of lunch lab for some project?
translation.zh: 现在你又要为了某个项目退出午餐实验室？

translation.en: It's not, like, a thing. We just have a deadline.
translation.zh: 这不是随便做做的 是有限期的

translation.en: Okay. Yeah. Yeah, I see what it is.
translation.zh: 好吧 是 我明白是怎么回事了

translation.en: What?
His dad's in jail.
All of a sudden he's got no friends, so where does he turn?
translation.zh: 突然他就没了朋友 那他要找谁呢？

translation.en: He turns to you for some reason.
translation.zh: 出于某种原因他找了你

translation.en: And you think it's good.
You think, "Cool, Jason Hodges is my friend now."
translation.zh: 你觉得“酷 杰森霍奇斯成了我的朋友了”

translation.en: But next thing you know,
you're gonna start smoking marijuana cigarettes
and playing cowbell in his band.
translation.zh: 在他的乐队里打牛颈铃

translation.en: Greg, you are so weird. Relax.
translation.zh: 格雷格 你可真怪 放轻松

translation.en: Okay, yeah, but just don't blame me when you find out that he's using you.
translation.zh: 好吧 可当你发现他是在利用你时你可别来怪我

translation.en: Okay? To him, you're just a computer nerd.
translation.zh: 好吗？对他来说 你只是个搞电脑的呆子

translation.en: You're just someone he can get a grade change from
translation.zh: 你只是个要是他对你够好

translation.en: if he's nice enough to you.
That is so mean. Shut up.
translation.zh: 这么说太刻薄了 闭嘴

translation.en: He does have dreamy eyes, though. Yeah.
translation.zh: 可他的眼睛的确很迷人

translation.en: I bet you just fall right into them, don't you?
translation.zh: 我敢说你是迷上那双眼睛了 是吗？

translation.en: You know what? I can't do next week either, Greg.
translation.zh: 知道吗？下个星期我也不行 格雷格

translation.en: Fine.
Friday night gaming is permanently canceled.
translation.zh: 周五游戏之夜永久取消

translation.en: Fine.
I gotta go.
What, is he on to us?
translation.zh: 怎么了 他知道我们的事了？

translation.en: No, he's just an idiot.
translation.zh: 不是 他就是个笨蛋

translation.en: So what are we doing?
Glad you changed your mind.
Yeah.
Okay, this is what I have so far about error coins.
translation.zh: 好吧这就是我目前了解到的错币的事

translation.en: Hey.
Are you guys working on your project during lunch?
translation.zh: 你们在午餐时讨论项目的事吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
Um...This is the only time we can meet for our study group.
translation.zh: 这是我们学习小组唯一能见面的时间

translation.en: Your study group?
For art class.
Well, it is the most difficult art class in the whole school.
It's the only art class in the school, Jason.
translation.zh: 是学校里唯一的艺术课 杰森

translation.en: And maybe if you study, you'll get a passing grade.
translation.zh: 要是你学习 你考试就能及格

translation.en: -This is cool. -Um...
[stutters] We have a lot to finish before lunch is over, so...
translation.zh: 午餐结束前我们有好多要做 所以…

translation.en: Carry on.
Okay, we definitely have to find a new place to meet.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们一定得找个新的碰头地点

translation.en: I've got a place we can go after school.
translation.zh: 我有个课后可以去的地方

translation.en: It's not around here, though.
So, we can come here after school, after my uncle closes up the shop.
translation.zh: 所以 我们课后可以来这在我叔叔关店之后

translation.en: Just, uh, make yourselves at home, I guess.
Just don't touch anything unless I say you can. Please.
translation.zh: 什么都别碰 除非经我同意 拜托

translation.en: Okay.
What's your big plan, Jay?
translation.zh: 你的计划是什么 杰？

translation.en: Thank you.
Okay, uh, so, in 2004, there was a so-called error coin
that surfaced in Tucson and San Antonio.
translation.zh: 出现在图森和圣安东尼奥

translation.en: It was a Wisconsin state quarter.
translation.zh: 是枚威斯康辛州的25美分硬币

translation.en: It had, like, an extra leaf on the cornstalk.
translation.zh: 硬币上的玉米秆上多了片叶子

translation.en: -So, you want to replicate it? -Not exactly.
translation.zh: -所以 你想复刻吗？-并非如此

translation.en: Later on, they looked into the scientific makeup of the coin,
translation.zh: 之后 有人调查了硬币的科学成分

translation.en: and figured out that the error was done on purpose.
translation.zh: 发现这其实是有意而为

translation.en: How could that happen?
Well, in between the final heat treat and die hubbing,
translation.zh: 在最后的加热和冲钢压模之间

translation.en: the die metal is actually soft enough that if you have the right tools,
translation.zh: 要是工具合适 模用金属其实足够软

translation.en: you can make a couple little changes.
translation.zh: 软到可以在上面做出些改变

translation.en: If we get a die from one of the most recent state quarters--
translation.zh: 要是能弄到最新的州25美分硬币…

translation.en: Such as the Wildlife of Michigan state quarter,
translation.zh: 比如密西根州的野生动植物硬币

translation.en: which, according to that pamphlet, is set to begin production in early March.
translation.zh: 这本小册子上写着要在三月上旬开始生产

translation.en: -You wanna see it? -Yeah.
We can make an alteration.
translation.zh: 我们可以另做一个模具

translation.en: Maybe an extra fin on that fish.
translation.zh: 或许在鱼身上多弄个鳍

translation.en: [Alice] Yeah.
What would that go for?
translation.zh: 那造出来的错币要拿来干什么？

translation.en: We could probably sell them for, like, $5,000 each.
translation.zh: 我们可以每枚错币卖五千块

translation.en: We could make 2,000 coins.
That's, like, 25 pounds.
Okay, so we can definitely carry 25 pounds.
translation.zh: 好吧 12公斤我们肯定搬得动

translation.en: But how are we gonna convince coin collectors that they're worth $5,000 each?
translation.zh: 可怎么说服那些收藏家每枚值五千块呢？

translation.en: Well, I haven't worked all of it out yet.
[Alice] But once he does,
we'd be able to make back half the endowment in six months,
translation.zh: 我们就能在六个月里赚回一半的捐款

translation.en: which is enough to keep the school open for at least another year.
translation.zh: 够让学校继续运营至少一年了

translation.en: I will figure out how to get them onto the market.
translation.zh: 我会想办法让这些错币在市场上流通开来

translation.en: There are so many steps between now and then.
translation.zh: 这计划前前后后有很多步骤

translation.en: First of all, we need a real staff ID from the Mint.
translation.zh: 首先 我们需要一张真的造币厂的员工证件

translation.en: Once we have that, we can get in and set this thing up for real.
translation.zh: 有了它 我们就能进到造币厂里真正行动起来

translation.en: I have an idea.
Will you get off your phone?
[stammers] Why? What are you doing?
-Give me the phone. Get off it. -Hey. Get off the phone.
-It's expensive. -Excuse me? Hi.
Hello.
I'm Jenna McNeil. I'm with the Brown Daily Herald.
translation.zh: 我是《布朗每日先驱报》的詹娜麦克尼尔

translation.en: I have an appointment with Mr. Garcia.
translation.zh: 我跟加西亚先生有预约

translation.en: Are you doing an article on the Mint?
translation.zh: 你在写关于造币厂的报道吗？

translation.en: Yes, actually, I am.
Think we might be in it?
Maybe.
That is exciting. Go on through.
Thank you.
Uh... Hold on. What did you say your name was again?
translation.zh: 等等 你说你叫什么来着？

translation.en: Jenna McNeil.
-Um, I have an appointment at 12:30. -You don't want her to be late--
translation.zh: -我约的是12点30-你不想让她迟到吧…

translation.en: No, we didn't hear anything about a reporter coming in today.
translation.zh: 我们没听说有记者要来

translation.en: Glen, you don't want her writing
that everything in the Mint was great except for us, okay?
translation.zh: 除了我们 造币厂的一切都很棒吧？

translation.en: Go on through. Let me know if you need a quote--
translation.zh: 进去吧 -有需要告诉我…-我还要看你的证件

translation.en: [Glen] I still need to see an ID.
translation.zh: -有需要告诉我…-我还要看你的证件

translation.en: Right. Of course.
Hey, are you with the college newspaper?
translation.zh: 嘿 你是大学校报的吗？

translation.en: Yes, I am. All right. It's okay, guys. She's with me.
translation.zh: -是的-没关系 各位 她是找我的

translation.en: Called yesterday about doing an interview.
translation.zh: 昨天打电话来说过采访的事

translation.en: -Yeah, but we got protocol here-- -Glen, it's fine.
translation.zh: -但我们有协议…-格兰 没事的

translation.en: -Come on through. -Thank you.
I'll take you across the production floor.
translation.zh: 我带你穿过生产部这层

translation.en: So, uh, does the article you're writing
translation.zh: 那么 你要写的这篇报道

translation.en: have a specific angle you're looking to emphasize?
translation.zh: 要侧重哪个特别角度吗？

translation.en: Or are you just writing a general piece about the Mint?
translation.zh: 还是只是造币厂的整体情况？

translation.en: Oh, we just want to know more about how coins influence the world around us.
translation.zh: 我们只想多了解一下硬币是如何影响我们周边的世界的

translation.en: Fantastic. That's a great subject for an article, certainly.
translation.zh: 好极了 是新闻报道的好题材

translation.en: Uh... now, you can't take any photographs of the production floor,
but, uh, I thought it'd be useful for you to get a look around
just to get a sense of how things run.
translation.zh: 了解这里的运作会有所帮助

translation.en: [Benny] Just keep watch upstairs.
Dakota will text me when she's at the door.
translation.zh: 达科塔到门口时会给我发短信

translation.en: [Jason on phone] All right. Let us know if you see anything down there.
translation.zh: 好的 下面有情况就告诉我们

translation.en: Hey. wait. Wait. I think I got something.
Will you find Simeone & Sons HVAC on the schedule when you're in?
translation.zh: 你黑进去时能在日程表上找到西蒙尼和儿子们空调维修吗？

translation.en: You know, there's something modest about a coin.
You know, there's an element of trust,
translation.zh: 其中体现着信任的元素

translation.en: in that we all give it value, and we all agree on that value.
translation.zh: 我们赋予它价值并且认可这个价值

translation.en: And there's a real purity to that. [stammers] That it's a tactile symbol, you know?
translation.zh: 而且很纯粹 是种有形的象征

translation.en: I could talk your ear off.
This facility actually has a very fascinating history.
translation.zh: 这间厂其实历史很辉煌

translation.en: You know, I've got some background information on the first Mint.
translation.zh: 我这有些第一间造币厂的背景信息

translation.en: A lot of stuff from the bicentennial celebration.
translation.zh: 很多来自于两百周年庆典

translation.en: Would that be helpful for your research?
translation.zh: 这对你的研究会有所帮助吗？

translation.en: That would be amazing. Thank you.
Great.
[softly] Let me see.
-[mutters] -So, you've got two kids?
translation.zh: 那么 你有两个孩子？

translation.en: Yup. Nate is two, and Samantha is three and a half.
translation.zh: 对 内特两岁 萨曼莎三岁半

translation.en: Wow. That must be a lot for you and your wife.
translation.zh: 这对你跟你老婆来说肯定不容易

translation.en: Yeah, it is.
translation.zh: 这对你跟你老婆来说肯定不容易 是啊 我想在这

translation.en: I think it's here.
-Jess loves every minute of it. [exhales] -I bet.
All right. Here you go.
Actually, um, would you mind making copies for the editor?
translation.zh: 可以给编辑复印一份吗？

translation.en: If you don't mind.
-Not a problem. -Thank you.
Come on. Hurry.
Jason, please.
Okay, how long will this take?
[Benny] Depends on how complex the scan is.
translation.zh: 取决于扫描的复杂程度

translation.en: We need as much info as possible to make a good copy.
translation.zh: 信息要尽可能多才能做出好的复制品

translation.en: This way.
-[computer beeps] -[keyboard clacking]
translation.zh: （造币厂摄像头美国造币厂员工登录端口）

translation.en: All right, I have it for you here.
translation.zh: 行了 东西给你找来了

translation.en: It's a lot, but I promise you it's all interesting stuff.
translation.zh: 挺多的 但我保证都非常有趣

translation.en: My classroom, now.
I know you guys are skipping class, and I don't know why,
translation.zh: 我知道你们翘课 我不知道原因 但我会找出来的

translation.en: but I'll find out eventually.
translation.zh: 我不知道原因 但我会找出来的

translation.en: So why don't you just tell me now, before I give you all detention.
translation.zh: 不如在我罚你们全部留堂前主动告诉我

translation.en: But you don't know what we were doing.
translation.zh: 可你不知道我们在干什么

translation.en: -So can we go? -No.
And I absolutely refuse to believe
that a student who has been suspended, not once, but three times
translation.zh: 一个因为非法侵入 不只一次而是三次被留校察看的学生

translation.en: for illegal hacking activity is just skipping class for no reason.
I should probably check your grades.
translation.zh: 我也许该查查你的分数确保…

translation.en: -Make sure you're not-- -Whoa! I earn my grades.
translation.zh: 我也许该查查你的分数确保… -我分数是正当考出来的-那是当然

translation.en: I'm sure you do.
translation.zh: -我分数是正当考出来的-那是当然

translation.en: Man, don't judge her. That's not what's going on.
translation.zh: 伙计 别对她太武断了事情不是这样的

translation.en: I am not "man." I am Mr. Rankin.
translation.zh: 我不是什么“伙计” 是兰金先生

translation.en: Now, why don't you tell me how the four of you ended up together?
translation.zh: 不妨你们来告诉我你们四个怎么会在一起？

translation.en: Why wouldn't the four of us be together?
translation.zh: 我们为什么不能在一起？

translation.en: You know what I mean.
I don't.
We were working on your design project.
translation.zh: 我们在做你布置的设计项目

translation.en: It was way more work than we anticipated, so we decided to help each other.
translation.zh: 工作量远比我们预想的要多于是我们决定互相帮助

translation.en: Skipped a few classes to finish it, but it won't happen again.
translation.zh: 要翘课才能完成 但不会有下次了

translation.en: You skipped classes to do school work?
Yeah. [chuckles]
Yeah.
If I can prove that you were doing something
translation.zh: 要是我能证明你们在干什么

translation.en: that you shouldn't be doing...
and I will...
all four of you are going to be expelled.
If there's a school to be expelled from by the time you figure that out.
translation.zh: 要是你发现的时候学校还在的话

translation.en: That's not my fault, Hodges.
translation.zh: 那不是我的错 霍奇斯

translation.en: You all right?
Yeah, it's fine.
-[Dakota] Bye, guys. -[Benny] See you.
Bye.
I'm used to it.
You shouldn't be.
He shouldn't have said that.
You're, uh...
you're better than that.
You're...
Anyway, I'll, uh, see you later.
Thanks for the ride.
Yeah.
I, uh, looked at the reader. The scan was clean.
translation.zh: 我看过读写器了 扫描效果很好

translation.en: So I should be able to make a copy tonight.
translation.zh: 所以今晚我应该就能复制出来

translation.en: That's good.
You've made IDs before?
translation.zh: 你以前做过身份证件吗？

translation.en: Yeah. [scoffs]
Yeah, I've made a few.
-I'm not a criminal, you know. -No.
No, no, that's not what I meant at all.
translation.zh: 不 我根本不是那个意思

translation.en: [stammers] I'm sorry. It's not okay.
I know what it feels like
to have people expect you to be something that you're not.
translation.zh: 被人期待成为不是自己的那种人

translation.en: -It's not fair. -[chuckling] Yeah.
It's no secret that I got arrested before I came to Dennington.
translation.zh: 我来登宁顿前就被捕过这不是什么秘密

translation.en: I only made ten IDs.
And I didn't even do it for the extra cash, you know,
translation.zh: 而且我不是为了赚外快才做的

translation.en: it was...
It was for people in my neighborhood who were getting stopped by immigration.
translation.zh: 是我的邻居 被移民局查了

translation.en: Sometimes at Dennington,
I feel like the people that I made those IDs for.
translation.zh: 我跟那些我给他们做身份证的人有同样的感觉

translation.en: I'm always being watched
by these people who are just waiting for me to mess up.
translation.zh: 等着看我出糗的人监视着

translation.en: I really don't think that's true.
translation.zh: 我真不觉得事情是这样的

translation.en: I mean, they gave you a scholarship.
Yeah, because I'm smart.
I want to go to college. I want to be an engineer.
translation.zh: 我想上大学 我想成为工程师

translation.en: I think it's great that you know what you want to do.
translation.zh: 我认为知道你自己想干什么很好

translation.en: I have all these ideas but... [sighs] people keep telling me that I'm unrealistic.
translation.zh: 我有很多想法 但人们总说我不现实

translation.en: I have friends here, but they don't really know who I am.
translation.zh: 我在这里有朋友可他们并不真正了解我

translation.en: That's what I'm saying, Dakota.
translation.zh: 达科塔 这正是我说的

translation.en: Just because people expect you to be something
translation.zh: 就因为人们对你有所期待

translation.en: doesn't mean you have to be it.
translation.zh: 并不代表你就要照着去做

translation.en: You missed the visiting hours again today.
translation.zh: 你今天又没赶上探视时间

translation.en: Practicing a little... What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 稍加练习… 你来干什么？

translation.en: I just came by to drop off some paperwork.
I saw your mom was packing all this stuff up herself, so...
translation.zh: 我看见你妈一个人在打包

translation.en: Okay, well, I'm here now.
Jason, please, I don't want you to think of me as the bad guy here.
translation.zh: 杰森 别这样 别把我当坏人

translation.en: You're making us move out of the headmaster's house
translation.zh: 你在他受审之前就逼我们

translation.en: before he's even gone to trial.
I'm sorry.
I represent the board. It's... it's not just my decision.
translation.zh: 我代表校董会 这不是我个人的决定

translation.en: The president of the board, that's just a title then?
translation.zh: 那校董会主席只是个名头了？

translation.en: I wish I wasn't the one to have to tell you this, but, uh...
translation.zh: 真希望不用我来告诉你这件事

translation.en: your dad's gonna plead guilty.
They know he broke the law. There's no way around it.
translation.zh: 他们知道他犯了法 没得商量

translation.en: And even with a plea deal, he's gonna do time.
translation.zh: 即便认罪 你老爸也要入狱服刑

translation.en: You don't know that.
I don't have time for this.
What are you doing? We got practice at Max's.
translation.zh: 你在干什么？我们要去马克斯家练习

translation.en: [groans] I'm just dropping off some of your stuff.
translation.zh: 我只是把你的东西送过来

translation.en: Why? I thought you were driving.
translation.zh: 怎么了？我以为你开车送我们

translation.en: The band wants a break.
What do you mean, "a break"? We have to play the dance.
translation.zh: “休整”是什么意思？我们得在舞会上表演

translation.en: Right. Um... the guys...
feel like you're not into this anymore. You missed practice three times.
translation.zh: 觉得你不那么喜欢音乐了你缺席了三次练习

translation.en: What is that supposed to mean?
You know how you are.
You're really into something until you're not.
translation.zh: 在没厌烦前 你会全心投入某事

translation.en: You were probably gonna quit anyways.
Look, you... you got a lot going on.
translation.zh: 看 你有好多事要忙

translation.en: I'm sorry.
See you.
-Hello. -Hi, Grandma.
How was school today?
Good.
Did you find out about the scholarship?
translation.zh: 奖学金的事有结果了吗？

translation.en: [sighs] Not yet.
Well, when are you gonna find out?
translation.zh: 什么时候才能知道结果？

translation.en: I don't know. Soon.
We need to know so we can make a plan in case it doesn't come through.
translation.zh: 我们要做好准备 以防万一

translation.en: I'll talk to them tomorrow.
Okay.
[Alice] Hey! I thought I saw you down here.
Why aren't you at Junibel's party?
translation.zh: 你怎么没去朱妮贝尔的派对？

translation.en: What are you still doing at school?
I was just at the computer lab.
It's kind of nice at night. Quiet.
My dad...
pleaded guilty.
So...
Guess he really did it.
Shit.
I'm so sorry.
I just can't respect him anymore, you know what I mean? [inhales]
translation.zh: 我无法继续尊敬他了明白我的意思吗？

translation.en: Parents do shitty things.
I mean... [gulps]
my parents cheat on each other.
And they think it's fine,
translation.zh: 而且他们还觉得没什么

translation.en: because they come home for dinner and act like everything is totally normal.
translation.zh: 因为他们回家吃饭还表现得若无其事

translation.en: That's awful.
I'm just... used to it.
Yeah, but they're the ones who are supposed to have their shit together.
translation.zh: 是啊 可他们就该搅和在一块儿

translation.en: -Yeah. -Have it figured out.
So I think, if they're cheating,
translation.zh: 我想 如果他们骗人

translation.en: then why can't we cheat the system a little bit?
translation.zh: 那我们凭什么不能骗一下系统呢？

translation.en: If the adults are the ones who mess things up,
then why do they get to tell us how it's gonna be?
translation.zh: 那他们凭什么来教育我们？

translation.en: That's just the thing,
I don't know that I'm the kind of guy who...
I don't know, um...
Who finishes sentences?
Who finishes anything, apparently.
translation.zh: 能做成任何事的人 显然

translation.en: You're doing your best, I think.
How are you always so cool about everything?
translation.zh: 你怎么对什么事都这么冷静？

translation.en: Cool?
-Yeah. -[scoffs]
Like, cool and... collected.
And funny, you know.
Resourceful, too.
Resourceful?
Yeah.
Well, now you're just trying to sound smart again.
What?
Maybe we shouldn't complicate things.
translation.zh: 或许我们不该把事情变复杂

translation.en: We just started--
Right... [chuckles] and after we're finished, you'll just pretend that I don't exist.
translation.zh: 对 我们完成之后你会装作我不存在

translation.en: No, that's not what I'm saying.
-I just think that-- -Sure.
If you need a grade, or a schedule change,
translation.zh: 要是你想改分数或课表

translation.en: or to break into a government institution,
I'm sure I'll be the first person you call.
translation.zh: 我肯定我是你第一个想到的人

translation.en: I have to go.
I, uh...
I thought you never come to these things.
translation.zh: 我还以为你从来不参加派对这种事

translation.en: I, um...
kind of figured you'd be here, so...
Well, I'm glad you did.
I like talking to you.
I like talking to you, too.
I was, um... I was thinking about what you said.
translation.zh: 我… 我在想你说的话 我想了很多

translation.en: I was thinking about it a lot, actually.
translation.zh: 我在想你说的话 我想了很多

translation.en: I'm sorry we didn't get to talk more. That was stupid. So I...
translation.zh: 很抱歉我们没能多聊聊那样好蠢 所以我…

translation.en: We... we can't.
[Ethan] Hey, there's your girlfriend.
Hey, Benny.
What are you doing here?
Wow. Not used to seeing you at these things.
translation.zh: 看到你出现在派对上还真不习惯

translation.en: Guess I didn't realize I needed your permission
translation.zh: 没想到还需要你的批准

translation.en: to come to someone else's party.
translation.zh: 才能参加其他人的派对

translation.en: No, just, you're in North Philly, right?
translation.zh: 不 只是 你住费城北 对吗？

translation.en: -How many buses did it take to get here? -Dylan.
No, I'm... What? We're just trying to be nice.
translation.zh: 不 我…怎么了？只想表示下友好

translation.en: -Get to know him a little bit. -You did time, right?
translation.zh: -想多了解他一下-你坐过牢 对吗？

translation.en: Before transferring to Dennington?
Not really. No.
Please stop.
What? You actually wanna hang out with this guy?
translation.zh: 怎么了？你真要跟这家伙约会吗？

translation.en: Listen, you don't need to be a dick.
Did you just call me a dick?
Seriously, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 说真的 你来干什么？

translation.en: -Stop. -[Dylan] No.
I'm here because I'm friends with Dakota.
translation.zh: 我来因为我是达科塔的朋友

translation.en: Right?
Just go.
Hey, this is nothing.
Please?
She's right.
It's nothing.
You sure you don't wanna go with your friends?
translation.zh: 你不跟你的朋友一起走吗？

translation.en: I don't...
What, do you want me to say it's okay, so you don't have to feel bad?
translation.zh: 你想我说没事 好让自己不难受吗？

translation.en: Wait, what?
No. No, I get it. You gotta look out for you.
translation.zh: 不 我明白 你得为自己着想

translation.en: None of these people care about you.
Isn't that what you said?
No, I said they don't know the real me.
translation.zh: 不 我说他们不了解真正的我

translation.en: What's the difference?
You're exactly what all these people think you are.
translation.zh: 你就跟这些人所想的一样

translation.en: I think you should leave.
Yeah.
Can we run it one more time, please?
Yeah.
Alice has what she needs to manipulate the digital inventory,
translation.zh: 爱丽丝有了操控数字存货

translation.en: loop the security feeds and put the design into production.
translation.zh: 安全信息以及设计投产所需的东西

translation.en: Benny's fake die will be used to replace the real one
translation.zh: 本尼的假钢模将用来替换那个真的

translation.en: that we altered last time and left there.
translation.zh: 我们上次把它换了 留在了那里

translation.en: The fake die is not sturdy enough to do an actual run,
translation.zh: 假钢模达不到铸造所需的硬度

translation.en: so it'll probably break.
But when that happens,
they'll just assume that it was faulty materials
translation.zh: 他们只会认为是材料出了问题

translation.en: and replace the original on their own.
translation.zh: 自己把原来的材料换掉

translation.en: So, we get in, we do the run, Alice covers our tracks, virtually,
translation.zh: 所以 我们进去干活儿爱丽丝掩护我们的行踪

translation.en: and we get out.
If we get in.
You realize, if this doesn't go perfectly, we are all going to jail?
translation.zh: 你知道 要是出了差错我们全都要坐牢？

translation.en: Dakota, would you just--
Have you even spoken to your dad yet, Jay? Do you realize how bad this could be?
translation.zh: 你跟你老爸谈过了吗 杰伊？ 你意识到后果有多严重吗？

translation.en: -Would you just shut up? -She's right.
The production floor is complicated.
And we're entirely relying on the fake IDs
translation.zh: 我们全靠空调维修公司的假身份证件

translation.en: actually getting us in as the HVAC company.
The IDs will work.
If anything goes wrong, it's not gonna be on me.
translation.zh: 要是出什么错 肯定不是我这里

translation.en: How can you be so sure?
Seriously?
You're gonna question me after you barely made it past security?
translation.zh: 差点连安检都没过去你还要来质问我吗？

translation.en: I got us in, didn't I?
translation.zh: 我把大家弄进去了 不是吗？

translation.en: If something goes wrong-- Stop saying that something's gonna go wrong.
translation.zh: -要是出什么差错…-别再说了 行吗？

translation.en: I don't know what else you want from me, here. I'm doing everything I know how to do.
translation.zh: 我不知道你还想怎样 我尽全力了

translation.en: Okay?
So, let's all relax...
and figure out what's next.
What else do we need?
Well, I need a song list for the Winter Formal on Saturday.
translation.zh: 我需要周六冬季舞会的曲目单

translation.en: Yeah.
About that. They, uh... The band has split up.
What?
-When were you planning on telling me? -It's complicated.
translation.zh: -你打算什么时候告诉我？-事情很复杂

translation.en: You never go through with things! No wonder your band split up!
translation.zh: 你做事从来都是虎头蛇尾！ 难怪乐队解散了！

translation.en: And, by the way, what about the quarters?
translation.zh: 硬币的事呢？我们要怎么卖出去？

translation.en: How are we gonna sell them? Have you thought about that?
translation.zh: 硬币的事呢？我们要怎么卖出去？ 你想过吗？

translation.en: I'm still working on that part.
I don't know how you expect people to trust you
translation.zh: 你连个完整的计划都没有

translation.en: when you haven't even thought things through.
translation.zh: 怎么指望让大家相信你

translation.en: -Jay-- -Would you stop calling me Jay, Dakota?
translation.zh: -杰伊…-别叫我杰伊了行吗 达科塔？

translation.en: Look, we're not together anymore. You don't own me.
translation.zh: 我们已经分手了 我不是你的

translation.en: I will get your music, I will get the coins,
translation.zh: 我给你弄音乐 解决硬币的事

translation.en: and I will figure out everything for everybody.
Okay? Does that sound good?
Does anybody else need anything while I'm at it?
translation.zh: 趁我在做的时候 谁还需要什么吗？

translation.en: You know what? This...
This is over.
Alice, take the coin out of production. Delete it.
translation.zh: 爱丽丝 停止生产 把它删了

translation.en: Jason--
Just do it.
Good job.
You know what? Yeah.
This was a shit idea from the very start.
translation.zh: 从一开始这就是个烂主意

translation.en: Thanks for coming.
I'm sorry you have to see me like this.
translation.zh: 很遗憾让你看到我这样

translation.en: How could you do it?
Not just to me, but to Mom. And the school.
translation.zh: 不只对我 而且对老妈 还有学校

translation.en: Everybody you know. How could you be so selfish?
translation.zh: 你认识的每个人 你怎么这么自私？

translation.en: It's not like that.
The board, they rejected my proposals for investing in new programs.
translation.zh: 校董会否决了我投资新项目的提议

translation.en: They didn't wanna take a risk.
-And Harold Smerconish and I-- -Wait. Wait.
translation.zh: -哈罗德史默克里什和我…-等一下

translation.en: Smerconish knew about this?
He didn't agree with the rest of the board.
translation.zh: 他跟校董会的其他人意见不统一

translation.en: He said that I should go through with the investments.
translation.zh: 他说我该把投资这事进行下去

translation.en: So I transferred the money into a private bank account.
translation.zh: 于是我把钱转进了一个私人账户

translation.en: And he said he wouldn't tell the rest of the board until it had paid off.
translation.zh: 他说等收到回报他再跟校董们说

translation.en: That was the plan.
It's not what you think.
I just wanted to make a real difference.
translation.zh: 我只是想真正做出点成绩

translation.en: [Greg on headphones] I know you're blowing off steam, or whatever,
but can you not murder everyone in this village
translation.zh: 但你能别在任务结束前

translation.en: before we finish the quest?
[sighing] Sorry.
Yeah, it's okay. I know it sucks.
translation.zh: 没关系 我知道这很逊

translation.en: [Alice] Yeah, it sucks, but, like,
what would you do?
We worked really hard on our whole...
translation.zh: 我们真的很努力很用心地…

translation.en: design project thing, and now everyone just wants to drop out.
translation.zh: 去做那个设计项目可现在人人都只想着退出

translation.en: So what? Just make a new group.
translation.zh: 那又怎样？再找一队人就是了

translation.en: I don't know, maybe include your best friend, me, next time?
translation.zh: 也许下次叫上你最好的朋友 我？

translation.en: It's not like that, Greg.
translation.zh: 不是那样的 格雷格

translation.en: We were doing something important.
translation.zh: 我们在做一件重要的事

translation.en: Something that really mattered.
Like what? Extra credit?
Um... yeah.
Yeah.
Okay. Uh...
Well, if it were me, I would just go ahead and sign up for the extra credit anyway.
translation.zh: 换作是我 我会只为学分报名

translation.en: And tell them you already signed up and it's too late to bail,
translation.zh: 告诉他们你已经报名了现在退出太晚了

translation.en: especially with all the work you did.
translation.zh: 尤其是你已经干了些活了

translation.en: Then they'd have to help you finish it.
translation.zh: 那他们就得帮你把事情做完

translation.en: You know, that's not the worst idea.
translation.zh: 这主意还不至于烂到不行

translation.en: [Greg] Important decisions should not be left to the Jason Hodges of the world.
translation.zh: 重大决定不该让杰森霍奇斯来做

translation.en: Who knows, they'll probably thank you for it.
translation.zh: （美国造币厂） 他们会为这件事感谢你的

translation.en: -Shit, I did it. -Good.
See, you just had to get it over with.
translation.zh: 看吧 你只要坚持一下就行

translation.en: No. No. No. Saturday? That's too soon!
I never had a teacher who made me turn something in on the weekend.
translation.zh: 从没哪个老师要我在周末时交作业
